name: Hex Empire 3 (itch)
description:
Hex Empire 3 is unique turn-based strategy game where you can fulfill all of your deepest dreams of becoming a bloodthirsty dictator. All without even taking your fluffy slippers of your feet!

SINGLEPLAYER MODE - wage wars on thousands of map!
PARTY MODE - play multiplayer games on single computer!
MAP EDITOR - create own worlds just to destroy!
THOUSANDS OF GENERATED MAPS - you can play forever!
CAMPAIGNS - coming soon!
NETWORKED MULTIPLAYER - coming soon!

BUY NOW - PLAY FOREVER
NO IAPs - NO MICROPAYMENTS - FREQUENT UPDATES!

You will get all of future updates for free!
Comes with STEAM key!
